text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
you
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 86 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
Candide let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation Candide sometimes you are
very blunt in your communication and put
forth your point very clearly without
shying away the word candid basically
means to be truthful and straightforward
in your expression and communication
when you say something openly you speak
your thoughts without hiding anything it
means you are being candid when you
speak candidly you are honest and direct
in your communication even if the truth
that you say may sound unpleasant to
someone
the term candid is also referred in
photography where canned it means an
informal photo which has been clicked
naturally without formal posing the word
candid is an adjective when it describes
someone being honest and outspoken the
word candidly is an adverb as it
describes the action of someone speaking
honestly and finally the word candidness
is used as a noun
okay now that you know what canned it
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
example one Rosie asked her friend do
you like my new hairstyle be candid and
answer me example two on their first
date Richard was so shocked when Michel
spoke candidly about her past life
example 3 the famous actress was very
candid with the journalist during the
interview and revealed many personal
details of her life example for the
doctor candidly told his patient that
there was no guarantee of her complete
recovery even after the lung transplant
surgery example 5 the human resources
department gave candid feedback to all
their employees about their annual
performance example 6 Julian is one of
the most popular news reporters as she
is very candid and doesn't manipulate
facts example 7 my friend often takes
candid photos when I practice for my
dance competition example 8 Maria
candidly told Michele I disliked your
boyfriend you certainly deserve a better
one example 9 the Board of Directors
called for an urgent meeting with their
investors to have a candid discussion
about the company's precarious financial
position
example 10 Samantha's candidness always
gets her into misunderstandings with her
colleagues as no one can put up with her
outspoken nature that's the end of
today's episode have you ever given a
candid opinion to anyone and how did
they react to it kindly share your
experiences in the comment box below
this video thank you for watching us do
watch all the episodes of daily video
vocabulary to better your English
language skills do subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the
latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or a phrase
till then bye and take care
